Articles.Content:
Hi, and welcome to this replica thread!

Today i will be presenting:

a de Havilland DH.100 Vampire Replica

It can fly and it does very well!

The only mod here is Procedural Wings

Images:Link!

Download:Click!

Tips:VERY IMPORTANT!

1. Lift-Off as soon as you can, or else it will crash in the runway

2.If you want to make a long journey with this, you will need,Infinite fuel, or add your own fuel tanks.

You can add weapons too, it can add plenty of mass, as the lift can elevate more than the own plane's mass!

Thats it.

Thanks for putting attention to this.

(i dind't put the images in the thread because some people have slow internet)
Shame it's not stock. Anyway, I'm steali- downloading it when I get a chance.

Shame it's not stock. Anyway, I'm steali- downloading it when I get a chance.

But its only the PW mod!

it isn't a very big mod.

besides, using stock wings in the tail looked ugly.
